languages.text: "Отсутствие нужной подписи в данной ситуации, конечно же, страшнее всего".
"The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."
languages.original_text: "Отсутствие нужной подписи в данной ситуации, конечно же, страшнее всего".

traits.locale_text: "The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."
"The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."
"The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."
"The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."

languages.text: “是啊，在这种情况下，该有的签名却没人来签，这当然是最可怕的事情了。”
languages.original_text: "The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，在这种情况下，该有的签名却没人来签，这当然是最可怕的事情了。”

languages.text: «La ausencia de una firma requerida es, sin duda, lo más atroz de toda esta situación».
languages.original_text: "The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."

traits.locale_text: «La ausencia de una firma requerida es, sin duda, lo más atroz de toda esta situación».

languages.text: 「この状況で必要な署名がないというのは、確かに、一番恐ろしいな」
languages.original_text: "The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."

traits.locale_text: 「この状況で必要な署名がないというのは、確かに、一番恐ろしいな」

languages.text: "Natürlich, das Schlimmste an dieser Situation ist eine fehlende Unterschrift."
languages.original_text: "The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, das Schlimmste an dieser Situation ist eine fehlende Unterschrift."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, l'absence d'une signature sur un morceau de papier est l'aspect le plus horrible de cette situation. »
languages.original_text: "The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, l'absence d'une signature sur un morceau de papier est l'aspect le plus horrible de cette situation. »

languages.text: "Gerekli imzaların atılamaması, bulunduğumuz durumun vahametini gerçekten çok iyi yansıtıyor."
languages.original_text: "The absence of a required signature is, of course, the most horrifying thing about this situation."

traits.locale_text: "Gerekli imzaların atılamaması, bulunduğumuz durumun vahametini gerçekten çok iyi yansıtıyor."
